ej,grimc101,M,morac102,Call at HP (Kicked dirt) $HP umpire Charlie Moran called Frank Demaree out at HP despite the high relay throw appearing to let Demaree slide in safely; the Cubs got physical during the ensuing argument; 1B umpire George Magerkurth pulled Cubs manager Charlie Grimm away from Moran; Grimm kicked dirt on Moran's shoes and was ejected by Moran.1937PIT.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
